long_description: Built with a smooth-riding steel frame and fork and a 30-speed Shimano drivetrain, the GT Corsa 1.0 Bike is designed to be ridden far and hard on commutes, tours and weekend fitness rides. Double-butted steel frame supplies a buttery-smooth ride quality while remaining stiff and responsive. Shimano Tiagra derailleurs and shifters offer dependable shifts throughout the 30 gear combinations. Frame eyelets make it easy to attach fenders or a rear rack (not included) for enhanced utility. Vittoria Zaffiro tires roll smoothly and grip well in corners for good all-around performance. Specs on the GT Corsa 1.0 Bike are subject to change. Closeout.
short_description: Built with a smooth-riding steel frame and fork and a 30-speed Shimano drivetrain, the GT Corsa 1.0 Bike is designed to be ridden far and hard on commutes, tours and weekend fitness rides.
